name: Emmett
description:
EMMETTE

Entrapped in a strange facility, you find your way to the exit through the use of shadows - creating blocks from nothing and entrances where there would otherwise be none. 
All you have is Emmett, your happy-go-lucky Companion Cube (Not to be confused with Portal's CC).

As you make your way out, you begin to question what's real.

Can you beat it?
